alert.note: Alert for Elbert (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 7:39AM EST until January 10 at 5:42PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Georgia, including the following county, Elbert. * WHEN...Until 100 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Streams remain in flood due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 737 AM EST, Excessive runoff from yesterday`s heavy rainfall will continue to result in flooding of low-lying areas near the Broad River and Beaverdam Creek into this afternoon. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
